name: Aiphone GT Setup Tool for Android
description: Setting up an Aiphone GT Series system is now quick and hassle free. When creating new or modifying a system, simply upload data with an Android device to an NFC compatible GT Series station.   Easily make system changes with the GT Series Setup Tool:  - Create new settings  - Download and edit existing settings  - Upload settings  - Upload standby images to GT-DMB-N entrance stations  - Select English or French for app interface   Questions about how to use the setup app? See (http://www.aiphone.net/product/support/gt/)
